cycl.desc: An inhouse project for a international company that was supposed to be used in their day-to-day operation. The project team consisted of 5 group members with similar expertise. The workload consisted of front- and backend development from scratch, UI/UX design, and user testing.

seuil.desc: As a fun project for myself I decided to mock up an online store. This was called Seuil after the french word for threshold. The design was based on a moodboard that I created from various outfits that I found on pinterest.
